𒉆 > 𒉅 𒐑 𒈬 NAM NUTILLU
𒉆 ∊ 𒄷

𒉆 SÍN/NAM- (abstract nomen prefix) 𓅓 ma- en- im- -ing -ence -ent -ness ност -nost -ment men 𓄣

𒉆 ˢʸNAM name synonym syn-omni 𓎟𓏤 / 𓎟𓏤𓏤𓏤 / 𓋴𓈖𓏪 / 𓋴𓈖𓏥
𒉆 special marker indicating the full reading of the adjecent sign see 𓏤 𓏤𓏤𓏤 𓏪

ε𒉆 epsiolon λ𒉆 "lambda" … π𒉆 phenomen fame see name

𒉆 NAM name™ "determined order; will, testament; fate, destiny" nomen es'omen
𒉆 نمره numero = sumero شماره ¦ 𒊑𒐑 reimen 𓂋 𓈖
𒉆 SIM sym- -ism !
𒉆 SÍN sin 𒌍 «Sîn» Moon
𒉆 SIM šīmtum “fate” 𓊃 𓊪 𓊗 šimᵖti šiābum
𒉆 SÍN "sin" 𒉆𒋳𒂵 SÍN-tag-ga Sündigen
𒉆 ˢʸNAM ᵈᵉNAM NAM name; omen "fate, destiny; will, testament"
𒉆 ˢʸNAM •number numero = sumero شماره šomâre :
𒉆 SIM समूह samūh ∑ Sammlung 𒉆𒐊 "group of 5" …
𒉆 SÍNAM < DYNAM δύνᵃᵐ in 𒉆𒀉𒅅 δύναμη dýnami "force" dynamicᵃˡ
𒉆 SÍNAM < DYNAM in 𒉆𒋳𒋳 damnation ⇔ 𒉆 SÍN "sin"
𒉆 SÍNAM < DYNAM in 𒉆𒋻 demon, sickness
𒉆 SÍNAM < DYNAM 𓂧 𓌗 𓌳 𓀀 𓏥 | groups, classes |
𒉆 SÍN ⇔ صِنْف ṣinf صنف senf синыф sinıf სინიჶი sinifi сынып synyp 种 zhǒng ຊະນິດ sa'nit genus class group specimen

𒉆 SÍN SIM syn- sym- < con com in 𒉆𒂵𒆜 commerce
𒉆 SÍN in 𒉆𒍑𒆪 sin₂gala "singing" ⇔ summen:

𒉆 SÍN > -ness reverse in 𒉆𒃴 cleverness, skilfulness
𒉆 SIM 𒋛𒅎 si-im "smell, sniff" 𒉆 SÍN 𓋴 𓈖 𓂉 𓀁 @ snout noƒe 𓋴 𓌢 𓈖 𓂉 | snout | ϣⲁⲛⲧ šant

𒉆 SIM ≈ 𓊗 •śimpti 𓊃 𓊪 𓊗 šimᵖti 𒋆 𒋾 "fate" @ 𒉆𒋾𒀧 ⇔ 𓋴 𓋹 𓈖 𓐍

𒉆 NAM | man in
𒉆 NAM- man-of… …-man craftman(ship)
𒉆 man in 𒉆𒆗 nam-ĝuruš ˢʸnamĝuruš manliness
𒉆 man in 𒌋𒌋 Amun king in 𒉆𒂗 nam-en ˢʸnamen syn-amun shar-amen the office of en-priest; kingship
𒉆 man in 𒌋𒌋 Amun 𒉆𒉺𒋼𒋛 ˢʸnamensik mensik > malik ?
𒉆 man in 𒉆𒃞 nam-men (GA₂×ME+EN) ˢʸnammen lordship
𒉆 man in 𒉆𒍑 nam-nita ˢʸnamnita manhood
𒉆 men ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 in 𒉆𒀳 NAM… ñemitỹ noma 农 nóng 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 𓀸 ⲙⲉⲛⲧⲟⲩⲱⲓ mentouōi "farming" 𒉆𒂟 nam-erin₂ field-working
𒉆 man ≈ moni in 𒉆𒉺𒈗 ĝarza₂mon ceremonija "craft, office"
𒉆 man ≈ mini in 𒉆𒊮𒌓 administration (somehow, maybe;)
𒉆 man ≈ min in 𒉆𒋗𒄩 memancing മീൻപിടിത്തം mīṉpiṭittaṁ men𓄣pesca "fishing" मत्स्य पालन
𒉆 man ≈ ment

Strong tendency of reanalysis

Strong tendency of right reverse reading amplified in
𒁲𒋛𒉆 δικαιοσύνη dikaiosúnē "righteousness" 𒉆𒋛𒁲

If 𒉆 nam is read phonetically and not just a grammatical marker it makes Sumerian decidedly unfamiliar ¬PIE
If 𒉆 sim is read phonetically as sym- syn- it makes Sumerian decidedly familiar PIE

Both may be true: An unfamiliar Sumerian marker might have influenced a PIE prefix.

𒉆 nam phonetically as ablaut marker?
𒄊𒀴 šakan₆ حَاكِم ˢḥākim "governor" => 𒉆𒄊𒀴 nam-šakan₆ حُكْمِة hukmah "governorship"

𒉇 nam₂ √mens mind (fore)thought, plan(ning); understanding; instruction

𒉆 ≈ 𒀸𒁹𒌋𒁹𒀹𒑋 (𒀹𒑋 ≈ 𒐑 ≈ 𒊺 ) ≈ 𒋾 , 𒍣 napištu "life"

𒉆 ⋍ 𒊑 𒌋 𒊺 ri.v.š / š.v.ri ⇔ 𓂋 𓈖 ?

𒂗𒉆 #sanut senator 𒊺 ≈ 𒐑 in 𒉆 SIM SÍN šīm sym syn

𒉆 𒉅 ≈ 𒄷𒎕 🦗 𓆧 circada 𒎕 PIR₂ ≈ 𒂟 zirati ZÁLAG the locust

-ing

𒉆 nehmen (take)

𒉆 nomen > omen (destiny kısmet قِسْمَة qisma > -ism )

𒉆 NAM nomen 𒅗 INIM “noun, word”

𒉆 𓈈 νομός nome name omen 𓊁 vs 𓋴 𓊪 𓏏 𓈈 sparte/satrap

𒉆 nam = nämlich : 𒉆𒁉𒂠 ― ˢʸnam-bi-še₃ /nambiše/ ― because of this

𒉆𒊑 ˢʸnam-ri ار nawru "bright" like ray 𓇳 !

𒉆 nam ⇔ nome / name numbers numero = sumero 𒋗𒈬

𒉆 nam as an abstract nomen/pronoun prefix:

𒉆𒋾 ˢʸnam-til₃ /namtil/ life < 𒋾 til₃, “to live”
𒉆𒄭𒊓 (NAM.DU10.SA) companionship, friendship 𒉆 (NAM, abstract prefix) + 𒄭 DUB3:“top” + 𒊓 SA:“sinew”
𒉆𒄭𒊓 dostī दोस्ती دوستی дуслык duslıq 2-lich
𒉆𒆪𒇷 NAM.GU5.LI nomen TU.LIᵍ дуслык duslıq friendship 2-lich
𒉆 𒊑𒊑 radiance 𓁿𓇶𓇳

𒉆 nam = nämlich "famed" "awe-inspiring"

𓊃 𓅨 zusammen versammeln
